Title: Relates to providing for taxpayer gifts for the multi-system use program for the developmentally and physically disabled and establishing a fund for such purposes
Summary: Provides for taxpayer gifts for the multi-system use program for the developmentally and physically disabled and establishes the multi-system use program for the developmentally and physically disabled fund.
LawCode: Add Art 5 Title 11-A §369-d, Soc Serv L; add §§209-N & 630-h, Tax L; add §97-tttt, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to providing for taxpayer gifts for the multi-system use program for the developmentally and physically disabled and establishing the multi-system use program for the developmentally and physically disabled fund
